docstring: This is the preliminary Markdown-file of EXC2075 PN1-3. The main goal of this document is to define a data storage standard for Particle Image Velocimetry (PIV) recordings. The data model is still under developement.

description.description: Describes the content of the dataset

name.description: Descriptive name of the dataset / ID

date.description: Date/time when the dataset was created

authors.description: Persons who worked on the dataset

subjects.description: Research subjects covered by the dataset

model.description: Porous media model investigated in this dataset

keywords.description: Descriptive keywords to describe the datase (examples:PIV, time-resolved, time-averaged)

measurements.description: Contains all measurements done in this experiment

Root.docstring: This is a container for general information about the dataset. Please describe your dataset in detail here.

affiliation.description: Organisation the author is affiliated with

email.description: Contact e-mail adress of the author

phone.description: Contact phone number of the author

Author.docstring: This is a container for information regarding persons who worked on the dataset or created it.

recordings.description: Recordings that have been done in the course of the experiment

processing_steps.description: Processed video data of the flow measurement

software.description: Software that has been used to perform the processing step

camera.description: Description of the used camera system

laser.description: Description of the used laser system

seeding.description: Description of the used seeding device and seeding material

optics.description: Description of the used optical devices (laserarm, lenses, beamsplitter, sheet optics, ...)

triggering.description: Description of the used triggering devices

Hardware.docstring: This is a container for general information about the hardware which was used to capture the PIV data.

Device.docstring: This is a container for information regarding of general devices. For now it only applies to "Hardware-optics" but it could be for more.

Camera.docstring: This is a container for information regarding cameras which were used within the dataset.

Laser.docstring: This is a container for information regarding lasers which were used within the dataset.

particles.description: Seeding parameters of the used seeding material

Seeding.docstring: This is a container for information regarding of the seeding device which was used within the dataset.

density.description: Value of the seeding particle density in kg/m^3

particle_size.description: Value or span of the seeding particle diameter in m

kinematic_viscosity.description: Value of the seeding particle kinematic viscosity in m^2/s

SeedingParameters.docstring: This is a container for information regarding of the used seeding particles.

recording_mode.description: Type of recording mode (time-based, cyclic time-based, ...)

Triggering.docstring: This is a container for information regarding of the used triggering system.

manufacturer.description: Name of the used recording software manufacturer

name.description: Name of the used recording software

version.description: Version of the used recording software

Software.docstring: This is a container for general information about the used software.

shape.description: Shape of the flow channels cross section

hydraulic_diameter.description: Value of the hydraulic diameter in m

height.description: Value of the flow channel height in m

width.description: Value of the flow channel width in m

depth.description: Value of the flow channel depth in m

diameter.description: Value of the flow channel diameter in m

FreeFlow.docstring: This is a container for information about the free flow channel and the working fluid.

fluid.description: Name of the free flow fluid

temperature.description: Value of the fluid temperature in K

pressure.description: Value of the fluid pressure in bar

density.description: Value of the fluid density in kg/m^3

kinematic_viscosity.description: Value of the fluid kinematic viscosity in m^2/s

flow_velocity.description: Value of the fluid flow velocity in m/s

mass_flux.description: Value of the fluid mass flux in kg/s

FlowParameters.docstring: This is a container for information about the flow parameters.

type.description: What kind of object is located inside the flow channel? (porous media model, cylinder, ...)

location.description: Where is the object located inside the flow channel? (in, adjascent to, ... the free flow)

Model.docstring: This is a container for information about a possible object in/adjascent to the free flow

topology.description: Definition of the porous media model topology (rods, cylinders, minimal surface, ...)

height.description: Value of the porous media model height in m

width.description: Value of the porous media model width in m

depth.description: Value of the porous media model depth in m

porosity.description: Value of the porous media model porosity

periodicity_x.description: Value of the porous media model periodicity in x-direction in m

periodicity_y.description: Value of the porous media model periodicity in y-direction in m

wall_thickness.description: Value of the porous media model wall thickness in m

PorousMediaParameters.docstring: This is a container for information about parameters of the used porous media model

camera_id.description: ID of the camera that has been used

n_frames.description: Number of frames found in this video

time.description: Value of the investigated time period in s

repetition_rate.description: Value of the recording repetition rate in Hz

field_of_view.description: Value of the field of view in m x m

Recording.docstring: This is a container for information about the recording parameters
